attributes.action: Gender fascism, Political oppression on the basis of gender
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to recognise gender fascism as  political oppression. Within family matters such as access, child protection or residency for example it should be an offence to act in the best interest of protecting the reputation of motherhood instead of protecting a child. Gender fascism effectively prevents some parents from seeking support and leave children vulnerable to unreported incidents. It also hinders amicable access arrangements
